testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when field value EQUALS provided value

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when field value does NOT EQUAL provided value

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when field value NOT_EQUALS provided value

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when field value EQUALS provided value for NOT_EQUALS condition

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when all AND conditions match

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when one of the AND conditions fails

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when one of the OR conditions matches

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when none of the OR conditions match

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true for complex nested conditions

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false for complex nested conditions when inner condition fails
should return visible as true when conditionsConfig is not provided
should return loading as true when useFetchData is loading
should return visible as true when condition matches
should return visible as false when condition does not match
